name: Goostavo Porch Goose Sweater
description: I just got into the Porch Goose craze, so when I received my goose for Christmas, I wanted to make him a sweater ASAP. I’m a bit PSU fan, so I added the lettering from a cross stitch design website, however this pattern is so easy, it can be modified in many different ways.
full_text: I just got into the Porch Goose craze, so when I received my goose for Christmas, I wanted to make him a sweater ASAP. I’m a bit PSU fan, so I added the lettering from a cross stitch design website, however this pattern is so easy, it can be modified in many different ways. Please let me know if there are any errors. I was “winging” it (tee hee) and I would love to improve where possible. Post your pictures and let me see your warm porch geese!
